column6: THE ADAMANTIUM MEN PART 4 Wolverine is intent on bringing down Blackguard, any way he has to, but when he finally comes face-to-face with the man at the top, he finds the soldiers of Strikeforce X waiting for him, laser-claws and all!
column8: | writer:Jason Aaron | other:Chris Eliopoulos | penciller:Ron Garney | colorist:Morry Hollowell | colorist:Jason Keith | letterer:Cory Petit
